name: Plasmi
description:
In this game, you play as gelatinous blob with the ability to learn and mimic the actions of those around it. The slime must learn and use these skills to assist the heroes of each area on their quest, repel the invading threat, and end the time-loop in this comical and thrilling adventure.

How to Play

Menus
Shift: Open the dialog Menu. You must know a phrase to say anything. Otherwise it would be blank.
Ctrl: Open body and movement menu. Select a body and movement type to transform into it
Forms
Cube - take the form of a cube
movement
Stretch: press and hold A, W, S, or D to stretch in that direction. The longer you hold the farther it stretches, until it reaches its limit. At that point, it will begin to retract back.
Hop: press A, W, S, or Dto jump in that direction. Hold the button to jump farther.
Sphere - take the form of a sphere
movement
Hop: press A, W, S, or Dto jump in that direction. Hold the button to jump farther.
Roll: press and hold A, W, S, or Dto roll in that direction.
DefaultBody - a default created at the beginning of development. Use if you feel like it.
movement
Hop: press A, W, S, or Dto jump in that direction. Hold the button to jump farther.
CapsuleBody - Switch to first person and dig through soft earth like a mole.
movement
Mole: press a or d to rotate left and right and w or s to rotate up or down. Hold space to move forward.
Skills
Press 1, 2, or 3 to use the skill placed in that slot. In the pre-alpha build, the skills are locked and cannot be changed. Pick Up N' Throw is 1, Push Object is 2, and Grapple Hook is 3.
Pick Up N' Throw - press button to switch to top down. Use the mouse to select something to pickup. The view will return to normal after click the mouse or pressing the button again to cancel. Press the button again and you will return to top down. Use the mouse to select a direction to throw the object. The view will return to normal after click the mouse or pressing the button again to cancel
Push Object - press button to switch to top down. Use the mouse to select something to push away from you. The view will return to normal after click the mouse or pressing the button again to cancel.
Grapple Hook - press button to switch to top down. Use the mouse to select something to pull yourself towards. The view will return to normal after click the mouse or pressing the button again to cancel.
